title: Software Engineer
description: Designed backward compatibility functionality in the Data Security (backup) team. Backups are long lived cloud resources, and it‚Äôs important to make sure they are usable overtime and through representation changes. This involved designing backups in a way that preserves backward compatibility, and designing tests to identify and prevent breaks.

Defined and implemented statistics and dashboards for regression detection and performance tracking.
